pages.text:
THE BOARDROOM
AN EXCLUSIVE SOCIAL CLUB IN SANFORD
I AM PLEASED TO INTRODUCE
THE BOARDROOM
Exclusively designed and offered to only 25 Board Members.
All of our customers are VIPs, but as a Board Member, you will have exclusive offerings and become a decision-maker regarding many important operational offerings.  Every quarter the Board will be invited to a premium tasting of Cigars and Spirits and discuss what is best for our Lounge.
24/7 Access to the Boardroom.  Access is controlled via your Smart Phone Device.
There are a variety of privileges extended to members of The Boardroom, including a private lounge experience away from the crowd.
Blend & Barrel offers Boardroom members the use of our Executive golf cart for in-town excursions and our Mercedes Sprinter limousine for member outings.
Come Visit Us !
.entry-content
